article: Kung Fu Panda is a 2008 American computer - animated action comedy movie made by DreamWorks . It was directed by John Stevenson and Mark Osborne . It tells the story about a big fat panda named Po who is a kung fu fan . The movie came out in 2008 and stars Jack Black as Po . It received critical acclaim and became a box office success . A successful sequel , Kung Fu Panda 2 was released in 2011 . A big , fat panda named Po the panda dreams of becoming a kung fu master , but he does n ' t know kung fu . One day , kung fu teacher Master Shifu holds a competition to see who will become the Dragon Warrior , the most powerful kung fu master in the land . Everyone thinks one of Shifu ' s students , the Furious Five will become the Dragon Warrior , but Po is chosen instead and begins learning kung fu . Shifu and the Furious Five do n ' t like Po the panda and try to make him quit , but he becomes friends with them . When Master Shifu learns that the evil Tai Lung the snow leopard is coming to the land , he quickly teaches Po kung fu so he can be given the Dragon Scroll that will help him beat Tai Lung . Nothing is written on the scroll , but Po finds out that he does n ' t need the scroll to be the Dragon Warrior and beats Tai Lung without it . Po becomes a kung fu master and Dragon Warrior loved by everyone and peace returns to the land .
questions: Which of the following is WRONG ?

model: the chinese people know how to kung fu .
there are four kung fu students in the movie .
the furious five become the dragon warrior .
the powerful kung fu master can be taken away by his team .
human: Master Shifu is a kung fu teacher .
The Furious Five are Master Shifu ' s students .
Shifu and the Furious Five do n ' t like Po the panda .
The Furious Five become the Dragon Warrior .
